description: Counts the number of Stepping Stone deliverables, and performs the action to the right if the comparison succeeds.
Counts the number of research methods of a given strategy (e.g. Field), and performs the action to the right if the comparison succeeds.
Counts the number of research questions, and performs the action to the right if the comparison succeeds.
Counts the total number of research methods of all strategies combined, and performs the action to the right if the comparison succeeds.
Counts the number of used research strategies, and performs the action to the right if the comparison succeeds.
Calculates Strategy Representation statistics about the project approach. This condition always performs the action to the right, regardless of the result.
Calculates Triangulation statistics about the project approach. This condition always performs the action to the right, regardless of the result.
Chains two conditions like a boolean AND gate. Performs the action to the right when both conditions succeed.
Chains two conditions like a boolean OR gate. Performs the action to the right when either one or both conditions succeed.
